title: Get a data source
description: Retrieves information for a specific data source, such as Google Ads or YouTube, supported by the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.

objective.narrative: To automate the creation of data transfers, a developer first needs to know the specific parameters and requirements of the intended data source. Fetching this metadata from the API is a necessary prerequisite for building dynamic transfer configuration logic.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_datasource_get
